RT @CFlandersVT: .@uvmvermont prez @SVGarimella says he's again recommending a tuition freeze for next academic year. He's also proposing t‚Ä¶

.@uvmvermont prez @SVGarimella says he's again recommending a tuition freeze for next academic year. He's also proposing to freeze room and board, which has risen 3.2 percent annually over the last eight years. The board of trustees will make a final decision in the spring. #vted
